verses.roman:
saṅkṣepe kahiluṅ ei pari-muṇḍā-nṛtya
adyāpiha gāya yāhā caitanyera bhṛtya

synonyms: saṅkṣepe—in brief; kahiluṅ—I have described; ei—this; pari-muṇḍā-nṛtya—dancing in the dancing hall of Jagannātha's temple; adyāpiha—even up-to-dately; gāya—sing about; yāhā—which; caitanyera bhṛtya—the servants of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Thus I have briefly described Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's dancing in the hall of the Jagannātha temple. The servants of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sing about this dancing even now.
